channel.title: Sham Rocks.
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Sham Rocks."

item.title: Re: Sham Rocks.
item.content:encoded:
Or you could use filler theme's to unlock Month locked content, then ingrediant hunt.

however if you're looking for some, i have one in my storehouse and i do believe 1 of my friends in the village has 2 extra by themself. if you're interested PM me on here, or BvS

item.title: Re: Sham Rocks.
item.content:encoded: Sham rocks can also be found in the wasteland as a ash covered gem that gets appraised as a sham rock.

item.title: Re: Sham Rocks.
item.content:encoded: Sham Rocks come from Ingredient Hunting (which means your Village needs a potion palace). You can only find them on days when your Science! machine (another upgrade) has triggered finding rare ingredients for that day. The highest chance of this happening is a 25% chance every day, if you activate the machine every day (with Lab Coats). More likely, the most you'll see it is activated every other day at a 20% chance (no lab coats).

item.title: Sham Rocks.
item.content:encoded: Do you need to be on the Special mission to get them or what? Can someone explain the whole process here?
